Another Man's Pencil Test
The final pencil test for Another Man's Treasure. Roughly 800 individual drawings. Watch the final to see how it was rendered and what was cut.

Black Boxer
My first traditionally done animation. This 80 drawing test is how I discovered my love for traditional animation with charcoal on paper.

5 Second fire loop for an unused animation

Frown test
The mouth traced and shaded in charcoal for an unused animation

Hamball
One of my first animations using a free version of ToonBoom. It's about a hamster exacting vengeance on their human overlords
